issue.name: TPageControl.TabHeight
issue.short: Changing of default tab height is not supported

issue.name: TPageControl.TabWidth
issue.short: Changing of default tab width is not supported

issue.name: TCalendar.MinDate
issue.descr: While programmatically setting a date is limited by MinDate/MaxDate, the calendar still allow to select dates that are out of that range

issue.name: TCalendar.MinDate
issue.descr: While programmatically setting a date is limited by MinDate/MaxDate, the calendar still allow to select dates that are out of that range
